shuffleOptions.title: Shuffle Answer Options
shuffleOptions.description: Randomize the order of answer options for each question to prevent cheating

showFeedback.title: Show Detailed Feedback
showFeedback.description: Display detailed feedback after quiz completion showing correct and incorrect answers

showCorrectAnswers.title: Show Correct Answers
showCorrectAnswers.description: Display the correct answer for each question in the results (only for incorrect answers)

allowRetry.title: Allow Quiz Retry
allowRetry.description: Allow students to retake the quiz after completion

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts allowed for students (0 = unlimited)

showProgress.title: Show Progress Bar
showProgress.description: Display progress bar showing quiz completion status

questionNavigation.title: Enable Question Navigation
questionNavigation.description: Allow students to navigate between questions using navigation buttons

passingScore.title: Passing Score (%)
passingScore.description: Minimum percentage required to pass the quiz

shuffleOptions.ui:help: When enabled, answer options will be randomly shuffled for each student to prevent cheating

showFeedback.ui:help: When enabled, students will see detailed feedback after completing the quiz

showCorrectAnswers.ui:help: When enabled, students will see the correct answer for questions they answered incorrectly

allowRetry.ui:help: When enabled, students can retake the quiz multiple times

showProgress.ui:help: When enabled, a progress bar will show the student's completion status

questionNavigation.ui:help: When enabled, students can use navigation buttons to move between questions

passingScore.ui:help: Set the minimum percentage score required to pass the quiz

maxRetries.ui:help: Set the maximum number of retry attempts (0 = unlimited retries)
